ai-patthana23.51:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.51:0.3_0: for one who is attached to the object of what is limited,
ai-patthana23.51:1.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, nor repulsion come to be. Contact with a limited object.
ai-patthana23.51:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.51:2.1_0: It’s not the cause of insistence on the repulsion of the mind, nor does repulsion come to because of the attainment of the impediment of the path.
ai-patthana23.51:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.51:3.1_0: Not involveding the state of the impingement, not focusing on that object, because of the support of the state of being invited, cause and condition.
ai-patthana23.51:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
